body_content.explanation: the act of putting something into use after it has not been used for some time; the act of putting something in a place where it has not been for some time:
examples: They are opposed to the re-introduction of the unpopular tax.
Wildlife experts supervised the reintroduction of wolves to the national park.
He did not hide his view that wolf reintroductions threaten basic human freedoms.

body_content.explanation: the act of experiencing something again after you have not experienced it for some time:
examples: The conference was supposed to be my reintroduction to the world of politics.
He looked nervous on his reintroduction to high-level competition.
